name: Cryo
effect: Being hit by a Cryo attack leaves the victim affected by Cryo and decreases Movement SPD.

reactions.name: Frozen
reactions.description: When Cryo meets Hydro, Frozen occurs. Frozen beings are rendered immobile, but also become rock-hard.

reactions.name: Melt
reactions.description:
When Cryo meets Pyro, Melt occurs. The effects of Cryo and Pyro will dissipate when Melt occurs.
Melt itself does not inflict DMG. However, the Pyro or Cryo attack that triggers Melt deals increased DMG.
reactions.effect: Damage dealt by the Cryo attack is multiplied by 1.5.

reactions.name: Superconduct
reactions.description: When Cryo meets Electro, Superconduct occurs. Superconduct deals AoE Cryo DMG and significantly decreases Physical RES for the affected being.
reactions.effect: Reduces the Physical Resistance of all enemies in the AoE by 40% for 12 seconds.
